Name: System Purge
About the game: Trapped in a buried, forgotten facility, you must reach the core of an ancient machine to rescue your lost lover. System Purge is a challenging, atmospheric, and action-packed 2D platformer. Make it through 7 distinct sectors, from an abandoned weapons laboratory to a vast echo chamber Survive a wide variety of increasingly deadly threats and obstacles Discover secrets and complete hidden challenges to decipher the history of the Machine
